resources.string: Set the strobe interval in milliseconds:

I created this application out of a need for flash light app that had both a quick response time and didn't require more permissions than were absolutely necessary.

 I'd love to hear any questions or comments from you. Feel free to leave your thoughts in the play store as a review or send them directly to me.

 If you'd like to help support me as I work to make the Android ecosystem a less intrusive place, please feel free to visit my site and drop off a donation.
Default value cannot be less than the strobe maximum value.
